thread.title: Best of London's 5 star hotels
thread.title_full: Best of London's 5 star hotels - Review of The Goring, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Brenda A
title: Best of London's 5 star hotels
text:
I travel to London twice a year for business & have stayed at all the top hotels, fortunately, a friend told me about the Goring - quintessential British. The experience was top notch - great rooms, fabulous bedding, bathrooms luxurious and the staff is over the top - they want you to enjoy your stay. I found out this is one of the last remaining family-owned hotels and you can certainly see that the family who owns The Goring takes care of their impeccable staff. The tea room is so enjoyable and filled with many interesting "locals". Best hotel experience!
Room Tip: My room - a king -- was quiet, extremely clean and I slept great. See more room tips
